author: mahrwald
msg: ARIES-246: Fix duplicate anon component recipe problem with CompDefRegProcessors

author: niallp
msg: Add profiles to compile and test with Java versions 1.3 1.4, 1.5 & 1.6
In order to use these profiles the JAVA_1_3_HOME, JAVA_1_4_HOME, JAVA_1_5_HOME and JAVA_1_6_HOME properties need to be configured settings.xml to point to the java locations
(N.B. Although Java 1.6 is the latest release, 1.7 is supposed to out later this year - so the java-1.6 profile is added with that in mind)

author: gbrown
msg: Add support for BindType to Label, TextInput, and TextArea; add support for binding to checked state in ListView.
